items.title: UNDERSTAND MONEY MARKET SECURITIES AND REPOS
items.headline: Money Market conventions, calculations and traditional products (deposits, securities and repurchase agreements)
objectives_summary: Understand money market products: deposits, money market securities and repurchase agreements
Understand pricing money market products and make interest rate calculations: day conventions, zero coupon, bootstrapping, true yields and pure discount
Calculate coupons for broken periods and convert yields

items.headline: This course covers methods and alternatives to measuring and assessing ELCs and soft controls.

Recognize challenges of evaluating soft controls.
Explore Methods for assessing soft controls and determining effectiveness:

items.headline: Abundance = Choice + Freedom
objectives_summary: Develop a mindset to attract wealth and prosperity in your life

items.title: Types of Health Insurance
items.headline: Knowing your CPF Insurance Schemes
objectives_summary: Covers CPF Insurance Schemes
Look out for limitations and exclusions
Understand deductibles and co-insurance

items.title: Managing Debt
items.headline: Find out ways of avoiding debt. If you are already in debt, find out about all your available options.
objectives_summary: Learn how to manage credit card debt
Learn how to borrow money legally
Learn more about bankruptcy

items.headline: Learn the core fundamental Excel skills every Accountant or Finance Professional should have
objectives_summary: You will learn the most essential Excel Skills for Accounting and Financial Professionals - Skills that will enhance you career
Logical tests and IF statements
VLOOKUP, INDEX & MATCH and XLOOKUP

items.title: Social Media for Financial Services
items.headline: Successfully originate new accounts on social media in accordance with SEC and FINRA rules and regulations.
objectives_summary: LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook for Financial Services Providers
SEC & FINRA social media rules and regs
Business case for financial services providers to use social media

items.title: THE SIDE HUSTLE INDUSTRY - Home Made Money
items.headline: Create a Profitable Home Business Using Your Existing Skills, Education, Experience and Hobbies
objectives_summary: Students will be able to look at exising products and services, improve them and create a better idea for their own home business.

items.title: Basic Steps In Retirement Planning
items.headline: Learn about the nature of retirement in Singapore and some basic steps you can take to prepare for retirement.
objectives_summary: know why it is important to start retirement planning early
know about the effects of inflation
know how to calculate the amount you need for your retirement nest egg

items.title: Steps In Estate Planning
items.headline: Learn about the Estate Planning Process and take the necessary steps to plan your Estate.
objectives_summary: to know the various means of estate transfer
to understand about CPF Nomination
to understand about Insurance Nominations

items.title: Beware of Scams
items.headline: Learn to recognise fraudulent schemes and fraudsters. Also learn how to protect yourself against frauds and SCAMS.
objectives_summary: to warn people about frauds and fraudsters
to help people recognise SCAMS, which can be both online or offline
to know how to protect yourself against SCAMS

items.title: Free CFA Calculator Tutorial
items.headline: Learn how to use the functions on a Texas Instruments BA II Plus calculator.
objectives_summary: How to use the required calculator for the Chartered Financial Analyst Exams
Functions of the calculator

items.title: Money School: Debt
items.headline: How debt works, how to get out of bad debt fast, and how to stay out of it!
objectives_summary: Know how debt works
Know when debt is 'good' or 'bad'
Know why lenders want to give you debt

items.title: Importance Of Estate Planning
items.headline: Learn about why people avoid estate planning and what happens when we do so. Find out about the Estate Planning Process.
objectives_summary: to learn about why Estate Planning is so important
to learn about why people avoid it
to learn about the Intestate Succession Act

items.title: Getting out of Debt made simple for everyone
items.headline: Learn how I got out of thousands of pounds of debt over 60 days using multiple small effortless changes to my lifestyle.
objectives_summary: Understand the 3 core principles to effortlessly get out of debt
Understand the 4 different personality types & which one they are and how they should approach debt as a result
How to find really cheap accommodation to save on housing costs
